short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Toggle your Google Meet microphone or camera with global shortcuts

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Google Meet offers keyboard shortcuts for toggling your microphone and camera, but these shortcuts cannot be triggered when your browser is not the active application. Google Meet Input Toggler provides an interface to allow you to set up global shortcuts to toggle your Google Meet inputs from anywhere in your system. 

Google Meet Input Toggler requires no interface or controls other than the initial shortcut set up. Simply set the keyboard shortcuts in your browser and you're ready to go.
